website_summaries.verdict: Dual action design eliminates odors and captures dust simultaneously.
pros: 3 carbon filters work to process air, neutralize odors and trap dust before releasing clean air back into the room
Quiet fan with 2 speed settings: low for general purpose use and high for quick odor-eliminating action
Eliminates smoke, cooking, pet, and bathroom odors for up to 3 months
cons: Cartridges eventually need to be replaced

customer_reviews.title: This Prevents Breakups
customer_reviews.text: Basically, my boyfriend's room stinks. I really didn't realize he would be this way until he got this apartment and his laziness reared its ugly head in the laundry piles and dirty sheets on the bed. Yeah..it's musty. Solution!! I bought this Hamilton Beach and plugged it in without his knowledge. Oh man. WONDERS. I can stand breathing there, now! I have since changed the filters and I've noticed just how much dust this pulls in, too! Cons: The scent pack that comes with these don't last very long. Don't waste your time. ***Update for Photos*** In case you're wondering if this little unit really pulls junk out of the air. Well, here you have it, folks.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: SUPER  A++  REMOVES cat box odors & quiet too
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually take the time to review things but I do read other people's reviews before I buy things. I felt like I really should review this item for people in search of a solution to a smelly situation. I have used it for a few months now & I am VERY IMPRESSED. I really hate the cat litter box smells (even the perfume smells of the litters). Now- I don't smell ANYTHING. This odor eliminator is just that- it eliminates odors- gone- you smell nothing! FANTASTIC, WOW, I wish I had bought one years ago!! Sound= yes, I hear it quietly blowing but it is very quiet. Certainly not a deal breaker. I'd say, whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JalapenoJane

customer_reviews.title: Makes no difference. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a 6x8 room with two litter boxes that I clean daily. There is a slight smell that gets stronger when they use the boxes. I put this in the room on low then on high and makes no difference other than the noise of the fan
customer_reviews.author: DAE

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small areas/rooms!
customer_reviews.text: Still Trying Product... will update if something changes. So far it doesn’t seem to work all that well for larger open areas or for very strong odors. But when used in smaller areas like a closet or bathroom with doors closed it works very well and does the job eliminating odors and keeps it smelling fresh!! At this time I would recommend this for small areas/rooms (closets, bathrooms, cabinets) and it’s most likely a better choice to get an air purifier that can handle large areas/rooms. (note: having doors and windows closed seems to help it work better in small areas)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly (Kyber3000)

customer_reviews.title: but this feels like a rip off
customer_reviews.text: This was obviously a return. The shipping box had a previous label cut out of it, the bags are opened and not even on the machine and the machine itself has black smudges all over it that I can't wipe off. I am by no means a fussy person, but this feels like a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: trulea

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a house in foreclosure 3 months ago. There was one room that smelt AWFUL (cat urine + dead cat/s?) with huge cat house structure built ins all in the room. We ripped them all out, along with the floor, painted the walls and ceilings, replaced baseboards and doors- to no avail. Tried vinegar, coffee grounds, baking soda- NOTHING. This little miracle was delivered yesterday- and IT’S INCREBILE the difference it’s made. Not even 24 hours plugged in. I wish I would’ve bought this sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheStuders

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cats
customer_reviews.text: This WORKS! I have 2 cats in a small apartment, so one of their litter boxes has to be in the living room. It’s disguised as a cute fake potted palm tree so it doesn’t look bad, but I was so self conscious about the smell when I had guests over—no matter how often you scoop, sometimes there’s just a smell! I bought this and plugged it in right in next to the litter box entrance, turned it on, and left to run errands. Came back a few hours later and couldn’t smell a thing! I did not use the scented plug in bc I don’t like scented air fresheners and it still worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: k80

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled With This Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, would definitely buy it again. The litter box smell was overwhelming the bathroom and taking over the house. I plugged in this product and within about fifteen minutes the bathroom odor was completely cleared. Day three and there is only a faint litter box smell in the bathroom and none in the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Shelter Bay Lily

customer_reviews.title: so I feel like this was a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: doesn't seem to work. I bought it for a 10x10 room where I keep my pet rat, and she's very clean to begin with. I bought it just in case. But it has a fresh scent pack in there, and I can't even smell that, so I feel like this was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Can't possibly be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I have neighbors that smoke pot, and because our walls are thin, my room always smells rank for hours. The first time I used this, my room was engulfed in odor, It cleared the odor out of my room within 15 minutes. The next time I used it, it was just as my room was starting to smell, and it was cleared out in 10 minutes. Now I just turn it out just as I start to smell anything, and it keeps the odor from seeping through my whole room.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer194

customer_reviews.title: Amazing air filter
customer_reviews.text: I have the litter box for my cat in my room and I have to say it does an amazing job masking the scent. I dont smell it anymore. It worked so well that I ended up getting another one. I highly recommend this to anyone. Ive had it for about 3 months and havent had to change the filters or anything else on it and I keep it on 24/7
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: no more odor of cat poop in my basement
customer_reviews.text: I installed this with minimal expectations. It was a last ditch effort to deal with the foul odor of my cat pooping on the floor and stinking up my entire basement. It has worked great. It takes a little while to clean out the odor but it does accomplish it eventually. I like the monitor on it that tells you when to change the filter. If only this thing would shoot laser beams at my cat's rear when he takes a dump 3 inches away from his box, I would marry it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I am a smoker and it makes a big difference in my home. I run it all day everyday and the filter should not have to be replaced for another 30 days at least. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I bought three of these and love them. One for our living room
customer_reviews.text: We live in an old house next to a creek. I keep it very clean, but it constantly smells musty. I bought three of these and love them. One for our living room, one for our daughter’s room and one for the master bedroom. My daughter has a kitten and therefore a litter box in her room. Even though we use unscented litter and she cleans the box twice a day there was still a smell. This air purifier eliminates the smell entirely. We have two large dogs who stay in the master bedroom when we are gone during the day. This really keeps the room smelling fresh. I am 100% happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MR29

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't impressed with the intake, but in the right sized room...
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and the shower drain needs cleaned or redesigned because you can smell the sewer through it CONSTANTLY. I put this sucker in the bathroom and what do you know? It's safe to breathe in there now. My bathroom is no longer embarrassing to guests. The indicator for filter replacement was a pleasant surprise. May get another to place by the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: gender8ombs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with the odor emitting from my cats litter box. I clean his box everyday yet it constantly smells RANCID. I hoped that this would help with the smell and I would finally be able to breathe again. I was seriously disappointed that my room continues to smell like death, despite plugging it in right next to the litter box. This might work for extremely small areas but as for large rooms, it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: For as small as it is it makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: It makes a noticeable difference in the room I have it in. I smoke regularly in this room and it cuts down on the stale smoke smell. It doesn't get rid of it completely, but for the price, I am not at all displeased. The scent pack that came with it didn't smell very good when I held it in my hand and I couldn't smell it at all after I put it in the device. The noise is completely acceptable. I have it running 24 hours a day in my bedroom and I don't notice it at all.
customer_reviews.author: mpyers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This work as described. One of my cats can be very smelly and when I am gone each of my cats are in their separate rooms. When I would open the door the smell would be so strong I would have to open the window. Now when I come home I only smell freshness. It can be used without the scent but I love the freshness smell because it travels through out the house. If you plan to put it in your bedroom it has hum that may be viewed as white noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a bathroom that has no fan. The bathroom does have a nice window for air flow but this little filter adds another layer of getting-the-smell-out protection. The scent is light, the fan quiet. Filters any bathroom smell out in 5-10 minutes. My only complaint is that I’ve had this item for only two months and it says the filter already needs replacing. I can clearly see that the filter is in great shape without any dust or anything visible on it...don’t listen to the filter replacement button in the item!
customer_reviews.author: Niccie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This actually works pretty well! It’s louder than I thought it would be, but not so loud that it’s annoying. However, concerned with how fast the filter is being used up. The meter that tells you when to replace it is going to be full in just a few days. Also the scent pack that comes with it smells weird and is very very scented when combined with the filter. I recommend using without the scent pack and buying extra filters when you order this since it doesn’t come with spares.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I moved in my apartment and it had a horrible stench to it. New carpet smell, neighbors cooking and other dirty smells that we couldn't figure out what it was. It was so overbearing that I knew I needed something fast. When you are in the house for a while the smell is off and on, but once you leave and walk in, the smell instantly hits your face...hard! This little thing was awesome! It worked wonderfully. I went outside and came in the home was more of a refreshed smell then the nasty smell I usually had to deal with. My apartment people will be working on the smell overall, but this thing surely helped.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Well But..........
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for the room with the kitty litter box. The first 2 weeks worked really well the scent was great and eliminated all traces of cat box odor. However, the scent packet that came with it ran out in just two weeks , now trying to find the replacement packets is a nightmare. May have to find something else like from glade or another company that is small enough to fit little compartment and see if it will work. Overall it does what is is supposed to do less the scent problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Im really dissappointed in this product. I put it in a small room next to my cats liter box to help control any smells and it does nothing. The little red line that tells you to change this filter is a little ink dot you break when you set it up. So it doesnt track the intake but just releases the ink to make you think its working. It didnt do anything for the room and its loud enough that my cat hates it. Wasnt worth buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference - but beware the noise!
customer_reviews.text: So this little thing does make a difference. I purchased it for my kitchen which does not include a fan hood and it smells pretty bad for a long time after I cook something. Well, guess what? No longer! This little thing does make a difference. I would highly recommend and purchase again. I was actually thinking of purchasing a second one for my room BUT, here's where the negative comes in. It does make noise and I would say more than just ambient noise. Not unbearable and you might actually get used to it, but it does make non-trivial noise, thus make sure you're ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Aristidou

customer_reviews.title: Great odor removal and air freshener
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these units for downstairs in our home. One is in the large rec room and the other in the laundry/half bathroom. We didn't use the scent packets due to perfume sensitivity issues. They were both set on low and left to run. It's been about 3 months using the Hamilton Beach TrueAir filters to keep the smell out of our homes lower level and I can't believe how well it works! The funky basement smells are totally eliminated. I am now on the hunt for replacement filters. This might be an issue. There are off brand ones that are available.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: This Cleans The Air!
customer_reviews.text: We have a multi-cat litter box in a small space (16 sq ft) that is connected to our basement recreation area via an opening for the cats to access the litter box. Before TrueAir, there were times that we could smell the litter box throughout the basement and sometimes into the main floor. Additionally, one of the cats has irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and this is a nose-killer. NOW...you can walk right into the litter box area and NOT SMELL ANYTHING even though you're standing right next to the litter box with the IBS cat. TrueAir is quiet and cleans the air.
customer_reviews.author: J Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Took the litter smell out immediately
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged this in 10 minutes ago across the hall from my bathroom where I keep the litter box in and the litter odor is gone already. It doesn’t matter wether I buy the unscented litter or the scented I just can’t stand the smell of litter. I clean the litter box out daily but the smell of even brand new litter in a brand new box even gives me a headache and I even tried out several different brands and types. I’m hopeful now that I can’t smell the actual litter my headaches will decrease. I will update if it doesn’t work like I hoped but so far I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: A small odor eliminator that works
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bathroom area because the water in the toilet smells heavily chlorinated and there are no windows to vent the area. It's been running all-day for the past few weeks, and I noticed a difference in the air quality shortly after plugging it in. It's fairly quiet and doesn't bother me in my bedroom, which is nearby. I wanted to buy a second one for near the litter box, but unfortunately the outlet is too low to the floor for the air purifier to fit; I decided to go with Hamilton Beach's stand-alone True Air purifier since I am happy with this little odor eliminator.
customer_reviews.author: lovetheoceanair

customer_reviews.title: Great for odor control in a specific area.
customer_reviews.text: This has saved our guinea pigs from banishment to the garage! We love those piggies, but sometimes their stink would waft out from their area into the entire house even just 24 hours after a thorough cage cleaning. We were embarrassed to have company over! This little box is perfect! It really does the job in keeping the smell manageable. It won’t deodorize an entire house, but it is very effective for the area around the guinea pig cage and that’s exactly what we needed. Ordering and changing out the filters is easy. The scent pod adds another layer of stink elimination.
customer_reviews.author: RightAsRain

customer_reviews.title: I didn't find that it worked for filtering out the smell of a litterbox
customer_reviews.text: At first I absolutely loved this item. It is a little loud but you get used to it. I laughed at first because of the reviews that said it was quite but I guess we all have our own opinions! Lol It came with a scent attachment that was wonderful and truly made me nose blind to the dreaded litterbox. (Which is cleaned out almost daily) But after a month the scent attachment of course stopped working so all I was left with were the filters, which I replaced. With just the filters alone it DOES NOT mask the scent of a litter box. I now have the bath and body wall flower plug in which works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Mosher

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and I keep it at work to help out with dust and unwanted perfume smells. It really works! Granted - it's small and only effective in the limited area of my desk, but that's all I need here. I think that the red indicator on the filter is time released and not affected by actual use, because it goes down even after I haven't used it over the weekends, but I just will try to delay replacing the filter till I actually feel it's not effective anymore. I am considering ordering another one to plug it beside my kitties litter box at home.
customer_reviews.author: LotsaPets

customer_reviews.title: Kind of works
customer_reviews.text: We have the blue air purifier in the livingroom. Off to the living room we have an office. Our dogs sleep there sonwe decided to get this mini ordor control. Our dogs are well groomed and their beds (as well as our girls) get washed/ bathed every 2 weeks. However, they love playing outside and get stinky. With this, the room doesn't stinky horribly, but there's still a slight smell. Overall it works okay (just ok). It also doesn't help that it looks ugly and outdated. It does make noise, but it's now white noise/ background noise and doesn't bother us too much.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana

customer_reviews.title: This air purifier works great at first
customer_reviews.text: Works great at eliminating odors right away. I've purchased three now; I plugged them in places such as near a diaper pail, the hall outside the bathroom, and near the kitchen trash. I noticed a big difference with just one and decided to add a couple more because I was loving the better air quality! But after about a week, the scent cartridge seems basically useless. They're a little quieter than our bathroom fans, so that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: No more cigarette stench!
customer_reviews.text: We have smokers that live under us and the smoke seeps through the vents in our bathroom and master bedroom. I was skeptical these small plug-in filters would be able to get rid of the smell, but don't let their small size fool you! We have been using these for two weeks now and have only smelled cigarette smoke once (when we used to be 4-5x a week), and it was quickly eliminated within minutes.100% recommend as an alternative to a large and expensive air purifier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is this supposed to do?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure what this is supposed to do other than be loud. The fan is louder than I expected. The plug takes up a huge amount of space. I could have stayed with my glade plug in for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJ B.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this works great if it is VERY close to the litter box. It won’t clean a large space! It takes away a bad odor but I don’t use the scent tab they give u. It stinks!!! I’m highly allergic to fragrances, scented anything & sprays so that’s why I bought this. I was desperate to help get rid of the cat litter odor & wet food smell too. I also clean out the poop right away but the urine still smells. I would definitely get this if u need help eliminating the odor & have an outlet close to the box. It’s larger than u might think but it’s whisper soft sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Works for SMALL rooms, makes noise.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Aussie and he sleeps in my room and it filters out the dog smell great, my mom tried putting it in the living room, but this device is too small to filter large rooms. We don’t have a big smell problem so if you’ve got a odor issue, then you might want to get something bigger, but filter helps a lot when it comes to lighter odors, and I had no issues, HOWEVER if you’re looking for something that doesn’t make much noise and you’re a light sleeper, then be warned that the fan does make noise, it’s not terribly loud tho, I can’t hear it over my sealing fan set on high.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Díaz Vco

customer_reviews.title: Has not helped with pet odors
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been running this in my 10x10 office since it arrived about 2 months ago. There’s a litter box and kittens are fed in the office. I really wanted to this to work, especially to get rid of the canned food odor. No such luck. But, I’m not going to give up easily. I’m going to order the filters specially for pet odors and see if that works. If not, this thing is going in the trash and I will have wasted $30. Update: This went to Goodwill. Even the filters for pet odors did not work. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 of these now...
customer_reviews.text: I love these little air filters! When deployed in the right-sized area, they're perfect. The system is simple: a fan pulls in air and that air passes through an activated carbon filter which absorbs odors. The first two I bought were to combat our across-the-hall neighbors' cigarette smoke and they worked so well I bought more for other areas! I have one in the closet where the cat's litter box is and the last one I got was for the bathroom at my workplace. The filters do remarkably well in these areas, just make sure to change the activated carbon regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Shelden

customer_reviews.title: It takes time
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a new apartment without a balcony and wanted to test out my small step in closet as a new smoking spot (tobacco/have not tried cannabis yet). I turn this on while I’m smoking. When I’m done I wipe down the doors and floor with a swifter pad and keep this on running until the smell is gone. It does work but you will need to keep it on up to 12 hours. I have the plug in with scent and am considering the larger room one. Not bad for $21 dollars. If you try it and feel like it doesn’t work just give it some time.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa campos

customer_reviews.title: These things are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I remember randomly getting these locally, with a "Febreeze" brand on them. I think back then I was looking for something to put around my litter box. I was shocked at how well they eliminated odors. They disappeared from all local outlets but I still faithfully keep one of these in every room of my house now. In a perfectly silent room you can definitely hear them. They're not bad. Certainly quieter than the tower style air purifiers I've used. Even without their added scent pods, these will destroy all airborne odors, at least in my experience. I like the scent pods they come with too though. They're a very subtle, clean scent so I might start reordering those.
customer_reviews.author: leenyx

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of litter smell!
customer_reviews.text: It works!!!! I was struggling to keep that cat litter smell from smelling up the house. We have 6 cats in a room where they sleep and use the litter box. I tried everything. The scented melt cubes, candles mopping every day and nothing would last. I plugged this is and within the hour the whole room smelled fresh and can’t smell the litter anymore. Will definitely be buying one for the living room and the other bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge!
customer_reviews.text: Pros~ Our bathroom is always fresh smelling. The scented cartridge that comes with it smells nice but there is no reason to replace it. The fan smells great without it. It;s quiet. Very quiet. The one we used to have sounded like a jet engine. Cons~ The size of this thing is crazy. It's overkill for our small bathroom. It takes up so much space on the outlet that we almost can't turn the light switch on and off! See pics. Also, the refill line turns red to let you know when to change the cartridge. That's fine,BUT the red line keeps growing even if I turn it off for days at a time!
customer_reviews.author: BinaryCode

customer_reviews.title: our new stove hood!  lol
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has helped us so much. We live in an apartment and have that microwave vent that doesn't really vent anywhere. We like to cook and the entire house would smell afterward. This little guy knocks down the smell tremendously. We keep it on the kitchen counter. The little filter indicator is pretty useless as I believe it just goes along with time, rather than use. I feel a visual inspection of the filter would be more adequate.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveOutlook

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice but still a big fan of it
customer_reviews.text: I had this for several years before the fan got gunned up but I still loved it and really noticed a difference when I was waiting for this one to come in. I have an extra room where we have our bunny free roam when we aren’t home so with hay, fur, etc it can be an allergy nightmare plus smells. This fan does such a good job filtering that all out... so the new one came this week with the scent attachment and you’d never know (eyes closed) it was a bunny room. I love the smell of it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good for dorm sized room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my barracks room in Afghanistan. It seems to work OK for capturing some of the dust and helping with the strange scent that seems to be pretty persistent here. It is not a full solution but it definitely helps. I think the issue is just old air conditioning combined with communal living and you can't fix either of those. I don't have any specific complaints about the product. It moves a lot of air thru the filters and although not silent it isn't overly noisy either. I think that the price/benefit ratio works out to be a bargain even with filter changes. I would recommend for smaller rooms. Overall I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jdoggy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Pet Parents
customer_reviews.text: For all my animal parents (or just anyone really) that live in smaller spaces or just have a tight budget: This plug in odor eliminator is the bomb! My kitchen has a tendency to just get really smelly thanks to the garbage and it's been plugged in for about an hour and the smell is completely gone. I've tried candles, bleach, disinfectant spray, scrubbing my walls... everything, and this is the only thing that's worked. Big air purifiers are too expensive for the room sizes that I have so every day I just move this around my apartment. I will probably buy more soon! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Julya

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders in my Suggie Room!
customer_reviews.text: I have these critters called Sugar Gliders and they stink! I even put fresh eucalyptus in their cages and it still smells funky! This thing helps so much! No matter all the cleaning I do they just have a smell and this product lessons it with out being to strong for them. I have to be careful of the product I use around them and this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery. Does his job
customer_reviews.text: Have 5 dogs, 8 cats and I'm a smoker who lives in a very hot place, so sometimes the AC needs to be on, was looking for something that would help me not having to do maintenance on it so often and this product has achieved that, removes odors, the pet hairs and the scent of smoke, still trying to get the smoker filters but has been working perfectly with the included ones so far, the scent doesn't last long so based on other posts buy the insert car ones and new flavor each now and then. Having tinnitus the really soft noise helps a lot as black noise. Totally gonna buy more for other rooms in the house.
customer_reviews.author: lupita abdala

customer_reviews.title: Really helps reduce bad odors
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three of these I have one upstairs in my home and one downstairs in my home and now I have just purchased one for my daughters apartment. It really does seem to keep The house fresh smelling. I Dislike when I come home and the house has been closed up and you can smell last nights dinner, the dog or just house odors. Now when I come home I don’t smell anything but clean a clean house. I give this product Five stars it’s great for the cost and I like the night light in the hallway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton True/Air Eliminator comes at great size, good price, but does not do the job.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the Hamilton Beach TrueAir device was ideal for my hotel room. It plugged in nicely where it shared a area with a wall hair dryer and my curling irons. Initially, I believed it would be workable for some time but was quickly disappointed when the matchstick size window on the TrueAir was quickly indicating the RED color to show need for a new filter. The original filter was installed days ago. See photo of mounted device which is not run continuously as intended because it was quickly showing need for filter refill. It operates quietly and has an On/Off switch but as a odor eliminator I feel it falls short.
customer_reviews.author: U-too? 📝

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really notice anything at first. Now that I've been using the unit for two weeks in my living room, I can definitely tell the difference. The air is markedly cleaner. It is not perfumed or masked as with most deodorizers, air fresheners, or candles. It just smells like nothing, instead of smelling like I have four dogs, three cats, and a teenager. I am considering another one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: debra starr

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats and teens
customer_reviews.text: We have a small apartment and have to keep the litter box in the bathroom. It smelled so bad. So we decided to give this a shot. This little thing works so well. We don’t keep the door closed and it also makes my (almost) teenage son’s room smell great too!
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations by far !
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I keep all 4 of my cat litter boxes in my laundry room so it smelled bad majority of the time but ever since I plugged this in its actually been very pleasant to walk in my laundry now. Very grateful to whoever made this product ! I’ll be ordering more for sure! Worth every cent and I would definitely recommend for pet rooms/areas.
customer_reviews.author: briante

customer_reviews.title: Decent odor remover
customer_reviews.text: I was originally planning to write a bad review for this product, but that's because I didn't read the instructions and was using this for a week with the plastic bags around the filters. So don't be an idiot and remove the bags first. It's for a small area, so have realistic expectations, but I put it by my stove and it sucks up the cooking odors pretty well (no vent).
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Greeneggs

customer_reviews.title: Love these so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I got one about a week ago and ordered two more right away. We have a large dog, a cat and we foster kittens. Animals stink. We have one by both litter boxes and by the dog bed. These things have helped tremendously. They do make a bit of a fan noise but I always have ceiling fans on so I adjusted to it quickly. I do foresee us going through filters about once a month as the original one shows the filter is about 1/4 empty. Luckily they aren’t pricey and they’re worth it. My house smells so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I have a very old house (115 years old) and it just smells like old house
customer_reviews.text: This little thing worked so well I bought one for every room. I have a very old house (115 years old) and it just smells like old house. These little machines totally freshen the air, leaving it free from old house smell. They have also cleared the rooms of dead rodent smell when a rat died in my walls. Amazing! Works to remove odors within a couple of hours of turning on.
customer_reviews.author: angelpenn

customer_reviews.title: Small unit but big help!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this little unit. We have two cats and although we keep clean litter boxes sometimes you can still get a smell. Since we got this and put it in a central location zero pretty and cooking smells! The only downfall is that's it's a little louder than I expected but not enough for me to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: April Cremeans

customer_reviews.title: It really, really works!
customer_reviews.text: We had something die under our floor - my wife says it was probably a squirrel, i think it was at least the size of a goat - maybe even an elephant. It really stinks! I tried room sprays, air deodorizer bags and my large room air cleaner along with running the ceiling exhaust fan and opening the window in freezing weather for a little relief. I ordered one of these little air cleaners, and this along with the exhaust fan has removed 90% of the smell. If i turn it off, the smell returns immediately which tells me the unit is doing a great job. They work so well I ordered two more for other areas of our house.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bengson

customer_reviews.title: MY BATHROOM DOESN'T SMELL LIKE CAT LITTER and it even seeps into the hallway ...
customer_reviews.text: One day later and I can already tell the difference. MY BATHROOM DOESN'T SMELL LIKE CAT LITTER and it even seeps into the hallway and it doesn't smell like cat food! It's amazing so far. And its not even loud. I couldn't hear it until I was in the same room, like a foot from it and it sounds like a really LIGHT fan. My outlets in my apartment are sideways and I was able to plug this in sideways and it's still holding so it works that way too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ioa

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: I let this run for a week straight and it didn’t help get rid of the dog smell at all. Opening a window was a much better solution and I will be returning this product. I really wanted this to work since I don’t want windows open when we have to start running the AC.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Works well, designed to fail
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these, worked very well to eliminate pet odors from the room where the dogs sleep. So, I bought 5 more to place around the house. Results were consistently good, but after a few times replacing filters the tiny plastic tabs that hold the front screen in place have broken on every unit. Easy enough to hold on with a small piece of tape, and I will continue to use them until the fan gives out, but I would not buy again or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at my son’s guest room and I thought what a great idea! I bought one for our living room (it’s close to the kitchen) and one for the master bedroom. There is a slight white noise which is really not loud and doesn’t bother us at all. It’s easy to install and I like that I can turn the switch on/off as needed. It came with a little scent gel which you don’t have to install but we did. It does seem to eliminate odors after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Aress

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed by this product. I was drawn to this purifier because of the rave reviews and stars. I used this for a small living space and it didn’t clean the air at all, and I noticed no difference in the air quality. I didn’t like the scent cartridge that came along with the packaging, but that can always be changed. I wish I would’ve just saved that money and invested in a larger unit that I knew would work better. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Yang

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago and gave it a thorough try. I find it to be nothing but a money maker for the manufacturer. Replacement filters and scents are ridiculously priced for the short life span. And it does not do the job as advertised. This may keep a small closet smelling clean, but it did nothing for a small 9x12 room. Absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: dg50484

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional dog groomer, with a small shop...I needed something for odor control, but have to be careful with aerosol sprays, as they are not good for pets. I plugged this in, and the next morning the salon smelled fresh and inviting. Nothing has ever helped this well. I just ordered the large model for my downstairs living area.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Galey

customer_reviews.title: Great little "workhorse" odor eliminator!
customer_reviews.text: A little skeptical about using this.....BUT I really LOVE it! I, normally, do not write a lot of reviews but this little thing really makes a difference in my bathroom. It takes a day or two to really notice a difference and for the carbon filter to kick in. I love, love, love the blue night light - it's a fun, cool color. I don't use the scent cartridge - too strong for me. If you're a little skeptical, just try it - for the price, it really is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade collins

customer_reviews.title: Sent Used Product
customer_reviews.text: After opening the product I realized that this was a used unit. There were burn marks in two places where the seams came together as well as black finger prints all throughout the inside and I also found some hair on the inside. Frustrating when you are waiting for something and have to immediately return after being scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma heart

customer_reviews.title: Great for eliminating pet odors
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased two more of these for my new home. I already have one which I have been using for over a year, near our cat litter box. We have two new cats, and a different home layout, so I felt we needed a little more power. These do a good job of keeping the house from smelling catty. They are a little noisy though.
customer_reviews.author: lsb

customer_reviews.title: It really cleans the air!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how well this works! I have a small basement that harbors some pretty rank smells and no matter what I do, I can't get rid of that musty smell, especially when it rains. This plugin took away that awful smell and the fan is so quiet, I didn't think it was working at first. I'm so glad I came across this and decided to give it a shot. I'll definitely keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather De Metro

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this at first but I'm glad to say that this really works! We used it to completely get rid of old cat odors from a previous renter and now we use it near our own cat's litter box to decrease the smell. When the power is on, the light is VERY bright, you almost don't need a nightlight. Sound is bearable but when you turn it off you definitely appreciate the silence. I've bought replacement filters and continue to use this—it's a good one!
customer_reviews.author: S.Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Did not  eliminate  odors.
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a glorified fan. The charcoal filters look like black foam inserts. I’m not even sure that they are charcoal at all. There is a scented insert and in reality it just covers up the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Murray

customer_reviews.title: If you have pets! Get these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a difference! We have two older dogs and two cats and between the litter box and “old dog” smell, I was loosing my mind trying to keep the house smelling fresh. I put one in the dogs area where they sleep at night and one close to the bathroom with litter box. Went to dogs room to let them out after being in there for the night.... No dog smell!!! Even my husband noticed the difference. Will be getting more for upstairs!!
customer_reviews.author: SaraiU

customer_reviews.title: Should have included a rotating electrical outlet adapter
customer_reviews.text: So far the product seems to work in the powder room. I gave this a lower score because it should have included a rotating plug like other appliances do for instance a CO2 detector. I thought I would take a chance and purchase it knowing that my outlet doesn't go up and down but goes across. The odor eliminator is to heavy not to be placed in a downward position. After reading the instructions, Hamilton Beach recommends you get an electrician to change the outlet direction. Really??? I am purchasing a rotating electrical outlet adapter for another $9.00.
customer_reviews.author: Jean V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, effectiveness questionable, incense don't last
customer_reviews.text: I have had them running continuous for over six months, still working. I was trying to eliminate the curry/body odor from the unit above mine using two of these, they were insufficient. Need bigger units. These are probably best for feint odors in 10x10 rooms or smaller. Depending on how new/tight your outlets are, these may fall out from their weight. I had to move mine around to find an outlet with enough grip. The incense these come with only last a couple weeks before shriveling up.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great product; highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to eliminate rather than cover up offensive odors. I have a few spread around the house. We have one in a bathroom that doesn’t have a fan & it is a lifesaver. The cartridges last quite awhile in our home. The red line on the filter let’s you know when it’s time to order a replacement filter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little contraption
customer_reviews.text: This really does help to remove allergens and bad odors. I put it near my cat litter area and it does work quite well. It puts out a bit of white noise but keeps the room fresh. You really just have to change the filters several times a year. I've rinsed them and let them dry and they work well as reusable.
customer_reviews.author: DrewGuy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about using the optional scent but it's not noticeable, very light in a big room. I read the reviews about the noise, but in a larger room I dont hear it at all. It's been helpful in removing an odor, I also feel good that it is filtering the air and not just covering it with scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: THE SINGLE THING YOU NEED TO INVEST IN WHEN LIVING IN NYC
customer_reviews.text: New Yorkers know how annoying living in a multi unit (as in hundreds) apartment building in the city is like. My building has really weak vent in the hallways, and sometimes I can even smell my neighbor's meals in my sad little studio apartment. HOWEVER! This little thing came and cleared up the air in less than 2 minutes. Annoyed by your neighbor's cooking?? You can't prevent them from cooking but this thing makes you feel like they never cook!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We put two of these in our (finished) basement to control dust and odor caused by our cat litter box (2 cats). The product is easy to install, and really does work to clean the air, and pushes out a clean fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Devil Dave & Allie

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 3 months now and it really works! We put this in our laundry room off of our kitchen which also holds our trash can! It really does eliminate odors! We have a bigger one from the same company in our cat litter room and wow the difference! I didn't use the scent insert, I'm not big on scents.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had to live in 3* hotel 400 sqft studio for 3 month during business trip. Room is clean, but there are some chemical odors after everyday housekeeping and weird scent from old air conditioner. Bought one device for test and placed it in outlet near bed - finally I can sleep and don't care about scents. Pros: eliminates odor, nice scent in default package. Cons: kinda noisy (like 30-40 db, but don't hear it if air conditioner is on) and work for small places. For 400 sqft I'll need 1 for bathroom, 1 for kitchen, 2 for different corners of room. I'll definitely buy 3 more devices, it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I will never purchase something like this again. It does absolutely nothing but make noise. We have tried everything suggested and even stopped using it to see what we could do different. We have two dogs and two ferrets. The two dogs who smell very little you cant even tell there is odor control. You hear the fan running but nothing. Tried it with the two ferrets and not a single difference. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that use potty pads in my laundry room. When I came home from work the smell would hit me upon opening the front door. I plugged in the Hamilton Beach odor eliminator and it started cleaning the air immediately. As long as I keep the area in front of the unit unobstructed it does a terrific job. Very, very happy with this product. Couldn't be easier to use. I did buy a package of carbon filter that I will cut to fit as the refills for this are way too expensive. Highly recommend this odor eliminator. Very effective in a small room.
customer_reviews.author: RBomm

customer_reviews.title: Odor Eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Live in a condo and the person below me smokes. Smoke has started drifting up through a vent in my bathroom. condo is trying to work through this but in meantime it stinks in my condo. With bathroom door closed this machine has made a big difference. This is the wall plug in model.
customer_reviews.author: Geri L. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using it in family room with hedgehog cage. Just changed filter at 3 months. Working well to eliminate pet smells. No longer notice pee smell when coming home after work. Fan noise is minimal. It’s on all the time. Added another in my kitchen. Cooking smells are noticeably less the next morning. Let’s see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Ch2

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small areas with minimal smells
customer_reviews.text: This is a good purifier for small areas that have minimal smells. It works well at eliminating pet odor, but doesn't remove fragrance smells or chemical smells. The low speed fan is almost inaudible -- very quiet. I like this filter for what it is. I wouldn't use it for a large room or to get rid of super stinky smells.
customer_reviews.author: KBCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Loud but effective
customer_reviews.text: After about 4 days, the Frito dog feet smell of my bedroom was gone, or at least hardly noticeable, after tireless routine efforts of carpet cleaning, dog washing, crate disinfecting, etc. The scent pack is very mild, so I'm not going to reorder, and it sound like the bathroom fart fan is on all the time, but the results are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mgbus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This TrueAir plug in is better than I hoped for! We have a small bathroom in our shop with no ventilation. Sprays just weren't doing it. This works great, so pleased. We turn it on as needed so think will last a long time. Our bathroom is approximately 8x8. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pcnative

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick, seems to only pull air within less than an inch per the unit
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this filter pulls in air if the air is outside of one inch distance wise from the unit. Light a match and watch where the air goes, you have to basically have the match a half inch in front of the unit before you see it pull anything in. Maybe I’m not using it right, but we use it near the stove to clean air around when we cook and there is zero difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens and those little buggers can stink up a room in no time. My foster room is small so I bought this thinking it would be perfect plugged in next to their litter box but the smell of little kitten poo still permeated the room and wafted outside. I wasn't expecting a miracle but I was hoping to alleviate some of the smell without having to buy a larger unit that they would knock over. Plus it is not aesthetically pleasing in the least. Large and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU HAVE A CAT, BUY THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. Ever since my boyfriend and I recently moved, the cats litter box was stinking up the whole apartment. You walked in the front door and that's all you would smell. We plugged this thing in right next to the litter box and I am blown away at how well this works. Like blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Alera

customer_reviews.title: Works great for liter box area
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother. We put it in a small closet where she keeps the liter boxes for two cats. It seems to work well as getting rid of the dusty smell. The only issue is one of the rubber feet were missing but this wasn't a big deal, it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Just As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this in right next to my cat litter box in the hopes that it would maximize effectiveness. I'm super sensitive to smell, and since we've moved to a smaller home I've had to place the litter box in a more prominent area, the lingering smell has definitely become an issue for me, even with daily cleanings and litter deodorizers. This device has been a game-changer so far, and I notice it even eliminates the clean, overly-perfumey litter smell, too! You wouldn't even know there are cats in here anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything other than eat up electricity
customer_reviews.text: I've ran this for about 30 days now and it has not made any difference. Looks like I wasted my money. Wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Randy M

customer_reviews.title: Filters cost makes it lame
customer_reviews.text: Having to buy a set of filters and air freshener every 2 months adds up. Might as well have purchased one of those expensive standing air filters that doesn't need a filter change so often. I'm spending more than 100 a year on extras smh Also the fans are getting more and more vibration so it's less and less quite
customer_reviews.author: Tuna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helps freshen up our small basement bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Before this purchase, our basement bathroom smelled greatly with a little box, and well "human activities". While I will say the item does not 100% solve the issue of the smell , it might once we try the pet inserts we purchased along side the product it does reduce the smell to a tolerable smell, and reduces the distance ti travels around the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Zombiexm

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a room that's dedicated to a cat and a medium rodent. It has REALLY made a difference! The room smells and feels so much more cleaner! The product does make a small and mild fan noise, which doesn't bother me at all. I purchased the pets odor refills, which work great! I plugged it right next to the cats litter box, and close to the rodents cage! Works like a charm so far! Would recommend to someone who doesnt want to spend a lot of money, and only have a smaller space to purify.
customer_reviews.author: Aleece Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend even though it has good review
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a very small restroom but it doesn’t eliminate the odor well. I turned it on for a day and the odor is less but is still there. Once I turned it off, the odor comes back right away. The scent pack that comes with the package smells bad and after turning this on, the restroom smells like a mix of cheap floral scent and urine.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: The fan on it is pretty powerful for a wall unit so I find myself ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it for very long but I bought 3 of them. The fan on it is pretty powerful for a wall unit so I find myself turning it off at night because it is winter time and I don't want the "fan" running. Don't know yet how well it will purify the room. I used one with the scent enclosed Green Meadow. It does not give a strong smell so I may be able to tolerate that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach TrueAir Plug-Mount Odor Eliminator with Carbon Filter + Green Mountain Scent Cartridge, Common Household-Tobacco, Pet, Bathroom, Trash, On/Off Fan (04530GM)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Plug Mount Odor Eliminator/Air FreshenerNeutralize Odors: The Hamilton Beach TrueAir Odor Eliminator doesn’t mask pet smells, food and other odors, it eliminates them. The quiet fan pulls air through and the carbon filter, trapping and neutralizing odors before sending fresh air back into the room for about 3 months. The optional scent cartridge offers a light, fresh scent. Replacing your Hamilton Beach True Air filters is easy. Simply, place the filter in the unit, fitting the notched corner of the filter around notched edge of the odor eliminator.
feature_bullets: Quiet and Efficient: Quiet Fan Pulls in Unwanted Smells That Are Trapped and Neutralized by the Replaceable Carbon Filter, Bringing Fresh Air Back Into Your Home.
Fresh Scent: The Green Meadow Cartridge Offers a Light, Fresh Scent That Replaces Unwanted Odors.
Traps and Neutralizes Common Household Odors: Terrific for Eliminating Kitchen, Bathroom, Pet, and Tobacco Odors. Also Good for Workrooms and Trash Rooms.
Easy to Use: Simple On/Off Switch for Maximum Odor Elimination. Unit Plugs Directly Into Any 110 Volt Outlet.Do not use detergent, solvents, or spray cleaners
Eliminates Odors and Freshens Air for up to 3 Months: Includes Filter Replacement Indicator to Let You Know When It Is Time to Change the Filter.

Replacement Filters Available: Use Any Trueair Replacement Filter for Common Household, Pets, Tobacco or Green Meadow Scent Cartridge. Models Include 04230g, 04231gw, 04234g, 04290g, 04291g, 04294g and 04600.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars5,116 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
